rsl87 is Correct i downloaded this earlier and watched about 20 min on my PS3 then the cinavia protected message popped up and muted the audio.. -_- it Gets Very irritating when you start getting interested in the movie then that message pops up its Ruins my day knowing i spent my time downloading somthing that i cant even watch on my Ps3...
I don't get uploaders lately. If it has Cinavia you would think it would be important info to share, so many people wasting bandwidth to dl a movie they can't watch.
Honestly guys, just encode the movie with Handbrake.  It's a free program and it works perfectly.  I use it all the time and playback on Xbox 360 and PS3 is flawless.

Cinavia is what it is, and will be in all new movies, you would be wise to just assume ALL non DTS releases will have it.  

You need to have a PS3, HDMI to a DTS receiver and use DTS = NO CINAVIA.   You will get it in all other sound tracks.   When using MKV2VOB for the MKV file, the PATCHING DTS stage is what you need to see, then you will have NO CINAVIA messages.

Either get the right equipment, or DEAL with it, it's called Copy Protection for a reason.

Thanx for the up!!! A10 V10

Alright now the Cinavia Bullshit there are a few fixes/workarounds for this

1. Change the file type from MP4 to M4V
2. Change the date and time on your PS3 to a few years and months later may have to repeat this..
